segments.text: I can't look away from this kitchen chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's drying that plate so meticulously.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the sink! Water's gushing out uncontrollably.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can she not hear or see the overflow?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The floor is turning into a slippery hazard.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now the children are climbing for cookies, totally unsupervised.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool is about to give way, I just know it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Boy's reaching in, plate in hand, like it's no big deal.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Girl's begging with her hand out, so entitled.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes stacked high, probably next to get wet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside mocks the disorder inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole thing makes me so frustrated.
segments.speaker: PAR
